description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) As an elite Interpol agent, it is your mission hunt down the evil Dr. Chaos. Gather hidden clues in this exciting seek and find game as it takes you around the world investigating elaborate crime scenes and clever mini-games. Complete missions in 4 player co-op to quickly gather the evidence needed. Unlock the full game now to bring this criminal to justice! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Track down the evil and destructive fugitive Dr. Chaos, as you search for clues scattered in exotic locales around the world including Moscow, Rome, Paris and Tokyo. Analyze crimes scenes to uncover hundreds of mysterious hidden objects and clever mini-games.  Complete missions in 4 player co-op to quickly apprehend this dangerous criminal and bring him to justice.
